line.text:
Planned Work
TRACK REPLACEMENT
Until Oct 5, Mon to Fri, 11 AM to 3 PM
[4] Service runs every 16 minutes between Burnside Av and Woodlawn in the Bronx
Some uptown [4] trains skip 170 St, Mt Eden Av and 176 St


The last stop for alternate trains from Manhattan is Burnside Av.
• Transfer at Burnside Av to continue your trip.

Uptown trains ending at Burnside Av skip 170 St, Mt Eden Av and 176 St.
• Transfer to a Woodlawn-bound [4] train at 167 St.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA stations.




Planned Work
TRACK REPLACEMENT
Until Oct 5, Mon to Fri, 9:45 AM to 3 PM
Woodlawn-bound [4] trains skip 183 St, Fordham Rd, Kingsbridge Rd and Bedford Pk Blvd in the Bronx


For service to these stations, take the [4] to Mosholu Pkwy and transfer to a Crown Hts-bound [4].

For service from these stations, take the [4] to Burnside Av and transfer to a Woodlawn-bound [4].

[ad] This service change affects one or more accessible ADA stations.

line.name: BDFM
line.text:
Planned Work
TRACK REPLACEMENT
Until Oct 5, Mon to Fri, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM
Jamaica Center-bound [J] and Middle Village-bound [M] trains skip Hewes St, Lorimer St and Flushing Av in Brooklyn


For service to these stations, take the [J] or [M] to Myrtle Av and transfer to a Manhattan-bound [J] or [M].

For service from these stations, take the [J] or [M] to Essex St* and transfer to a Jamaica Center-bound [J] or Middle Village-bound [M].

*Transfer at Marcy Av with Unlimited Ride MetroCard.

Alternate travel note:
Take the B46 bus via transfer at Marcy Av or Myrtle Av.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA stations.




Planned Work
TRACK MAINTENANCE
Until Sep 28, Monday to Friday
Downtown [B] [D] [F] [M] trains run at a slower speed in the area of W 4 St-Washington Sq in Manhattan


You may experience longer wait times, additional crowding and delays on [B] [D] [F] and [M] trains as we repair switches in the area of W 4 St-Washington Sq.

line.name: JZ
line.text:
Planned Work
TRACK REPLACEMENT
Until Oct 5, Mon to Fri, beginning 9:45 AM each day
Broad St-bound [J] trains make local stops at Flushing Av, Lorimer St and Hewes St in Brooklyn


Broad St-bound express service ends early.




Planned Work
TRACK REPLACEMENT
Until Oct 5, Mon to Fri, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM
Jamaica Center-bound [J] and Middle Village-bound [M] trains skip Hewes St, Lorimer St and Flushing Av in Brooklyn


For service to these stations, take the [J] or [M] to Myrtle Av and transfer to a Manhattan-bound [J] or [M].

For service from these stations, take the [J] or [M] to Essex St* and transfer to a Jamaica Center-bound [J] or Middle Village-bound [M].

*Transfer at Marcy Av with Unlimited Ride MetroCard.

Alternate travel note:
Take the B46 bus via transfer at Marcy Av or Myrtle Av.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA stations.

line.name: L
line.text:
Planned Work
SIGNAL IMPROVEMENTS
Until Oct 26, Mon to Fri, 11 AM to 3 PM
[L] Service runs every 12 minutes between Myrtle-Wyckoff Avs and Rockaway Pkwy in Brooklyn


The last stop for alternate trains from Manhattan is Myrtle-Wyckoff Avs.

line.name: NQR
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 09/28/2018 12:01PM

Northbound [R] trains are running express from 36 St (Brooklyn) to Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr while FDNY investigates the source of smoke at 4 Av-9 St.

Expect delays on [D], [N] and [R] trains.

line.name: SIR
line.text:
Planned Work
SCHEDULED MAINTENANCE
Sep 24 - 28, Mon to Fri
Oct 1 - 3, Mon to Wed
9 AM to 3 PM
[SIR] Tottenville-bound trains run on an adjusted schedule


• Tottenville-bound trains depart 2 minutes earlier than regularly scheduled.




Planned Work
SCHEDULED MAINTENANCE
Sep 24 - 28, Mon to Fri
Oct 1 - 3, Mon to Wed
9 AM to 3 PM
[SIR] Trains board at the Tottenville-bound platform from Pleasant Plains to Eltingville Stations


• Boarding change includes Pleasant Plains, Prince's Bay, Huguenot, Annadale and Eltingville Stations.
